prodNameC: 羅氏可霸斯毛地黃生化檢驗組
ingredientsDesc:
(Roche TDM OnLine Digoxin Controls)
Reagent contents : 
LevelⅠ  2 x 5 mL : Human serum with added digoxin and preservative 
Level Ⅱ 2 x 5 mL : Human serum with added digoxin and preservative
Level Ⅲ 2 x 5 mL : Human serum with added digoxin and preservative

Control values : 
Roche-TDM OnLine Digoxin Controls contain digoxin in the following concentrations. 
Level Ⅰ : 0.5-1.1 ng/mL
Level Ⅱ : 1.2-2.0 ng/mL
Level Ⅲ : 2.2-3.4 ng/mL

(COBAS INTEGRA Digoxin)
Reagents-working solutions : 
R1   Antibody reagent in vial A and B (liquid).
       Anti-digoxin monoclonal antibody (mouse) in buffer with preservative. 
R2   Microparticle reagent in vial C (liquid).
       Conjugated digoxin derivative microparticles in buffer with preservative.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: 在COBAS INTEGRA 400/400 plus/700/800系統和Roche/Hitachi cobas c311/c501/502系統上，定量檢測血清和血漿中毛地黃（digoxin）

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
